definition.de: Ausbildung oberhalb des zweiten Levels, meist erwartet von Fachhochschulen und Universitäten, die in einer professionellen Qualifikation oder einem akademischen Grad führt
definition.dk: Uddannelse på universiteter, akademier, gymnasier, seminarer, konservatorier og lignende institutioner, som normalt resulterer i en grad.
definition.en-GB: Education  above secondary level, usually provided by colleges and universities, which results in a professional qualification or academic degree
definition.en-US: Education above secondary level, usually provided by colleges and universities, which results in a professional qualification or academic degree
definition.pt-BR: Educação acima do ensino médio, geralmente fornecida por faculdades e universidades.
definition.pt-PT: Educação acima do ensino secundário, geralmente fornecida por faculdades e universidades.
definition.se: Utbildning vid universitet, akademier, högskolor, seminarier, konservatorier och liknande institutioner, som oftast resulterar i en examen.
definition.zh-Hans: 中等以上的教育，通常由高等院校提供的用于取得专业资格或学位的教育
